text: Kudumbasammetham is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jayaraj, starring Madhu and Srividya in the lead roles.http://www.malayalamcinema.com/userreview_kudumbasametham-.htm ==Cast== * Madhu as Vadakkepattu Raghava Kurup/Govindan Bhagavathar * Manoj K. Jayan as Shivasankaran Kurup * Narendra Prasad as Adv. Mahedran Kurup * Maniyanpilla Raju as Sreedharan Kurup * Babu Namboothiri as Prabhakara Kurup * V. K. Sreeraman as Divakara Kurup * K. P. A. C. Sunny as Madhava Kurup * Kaviyoor Ponnamma as Kochukuttiyamma * Monisha Unni as Thulasi * Renuka as Devaki * Zeenath as Shyamala * Srividya as Radhalakshmi * Adoor Bhavani as Nani * Sukumari as Rajamma * T. P. Madhavan as Balan Menon * Kanakalatha as Uma Kurup * K. R. Savithri as Rama * Subair * Adoor Pankajam == Soundtrack == The film's soundtrack contains 10 songs, all composed by Johnson, with lyrics by Thyagaraja and Kaithapram Damodaran Namboothiri. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! # !! Yesudas || (Ragamalika: Sankarabharanam, Charukesi) |- | 9 | "Pahimam Sree Rajarajeshwari" | Bombay Jayashri, K. J. Yesudas || Jana Ranjani |- | 10 | "Parthasaarathim Bhaavaye" | K. J.
